name: all-contributors
description: ✨ Recognize all contributors, not just the ones who push code ✨
author: All Contributors (https://allcontributors.org)

scripts.crowdin-upload: npm run crowdin -- --config crowdin.yaml upload sources --auto-update -b $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.crowdin-download: npm run crowdin -- --config crowdin.yaml download -b $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)
scripts.build-with-translations: npm run write-translations && npm run crowdin-upload && npm run crowdin-download && npm run build
